content:
all states need to approve to change a part of government
many times it was RI preventing

-ratifying the articles of confederation
-enforcing laws: there needed to be an executive branch to do this since state governments were weak
-passing tariffs: british were infiltrating US economy and tariffs needed to be imposed but the confedgov didn't allow them
-state tariff wars: states were given control of commerce and were able to issue tariffs and started imposing on each other
	this power needed to be cut down
